title: This Is the New Testament Week 1 with Tara-Leigh Cobble
description:
Join Amanda and Raechel for the first week of This Is the New Testament, along with The Bible Recap founder and “Tour Guide of the Bible,” Tara-Leigh Cobble. Why do we have four different Gospels? What does each Gospel reveal about Jesus? How do we see God’s unified character across the Old and New Testaments? And how is the wrath of God praiseworthy? Listen in to this conversation discussing the Gospel story that began in the Old Testament and continues into the New.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth This Is the New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the New Testament Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-new-testament-week-1-with-tara-leigh-cobble
